description.narrative: In Liverpool over 24,000 NEET young people aged 18-24 are claiming JSA benefit, and access to intensive training and mentoring is limited. Can Cook CIC provides young people with a 12-month programme of work experience and training to equip them for employment in the food industry. This grant will help train young people in food production, support them to obtain qualifications and provide intensive mentoring. As a result of the work, young people will be supported into employment and have better life prospects in the long-term.

participating-org.narrative: Roman Catholic Purposes - The Congregation Of The Canonesses Regular Hospitallers Of The Mercy Of Jesus Of The Order Of St Augustine At Ince Blundell
